overview: After reading the news about the discovery of the oldest map in western Europe, engraved 13.000 years ago in a stone, the filmmaker goes into the nearest village in Navarre (Spain) to trace, in 25 frames per second, the paths of a new map. Another map for the future. This project was made within the frame of the X-Films prize, at the Punto de Vista International Documentary Film Festival.
title: El otro mapa de Abauntz
